Room.Name: Snake Charmers' Side Show
Room.ShortDescription: You have found yourself amongst snake charmers in their exotic sideshow.
Room.LongDescription: You see snakes and snake charmers of all descriptions about you. The basket to the side is filled with several varities, and a young lady wearing pantaloons and an open vest reaches for one. A tiny, wizened old human sits in a circle of snakes and charms them with his rythmic movement of his body. Everywhere you look there are snakes and people handling them. They don't seem to be watching all of them very carefully, though, as a couple just slithered beneath the canvas of the tent.
